root.name: Front Office Card Games: Up and Down the River
root.description: Overview The first game no football simulation game developed and released by Solecismic Software. The game is based on the card game called "Up and Down the River" also known as "Oh, Heck" and "Oh, Hell". Features Record book: Measure your successes and failures.AI: Play against 2-4 computer opponents.Scoreboard: Track each hand played, trick by trick.Custom rule and scoring sets: Design up to 8 different rules and scoring sets.Statistics: Statistics is track for you and your computer opponents.Custom interface: Choose you own felt color and card backs.In game help: Receive tips and tricks from the in game AI.OpponentsYou can choose your opponents from 12Â characters from Shakespeare's universe.
